pollaxmud.entities

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • pollaxmud.entities.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    A question to be asked by teachers. A question consists of a Question, an Answer and a list of Options.
    Author:
    Oscar and Daniel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(java.lang.String question,
                java.lang.String answer,
                java.lang.String option1,
                java.lang.String option2)
        The constructor of a question.
        Parameters:
        question - A string representing the actual question.
        answer - The correct answer of a question.
        option1 - One of the answer options.
        option2 - One of the answer options.

    • Method Detail

      • printQuestion

        public void printQuestion()
        Method to print the question.

      • printOptions

        public void printOptions(boolean haveBook)
        Method to print the question's options. Three options are printed if the parameter haveBook is false, else two options.
        Parameters:
        haveBook - Whether two or three options should be printed.

      • shuffleOptions

        public void shuffleOptions()
        The elements in the options list are shuffled.

      • checkAnswer

        public boolean checkAnswer(int answer)
        Checks whether a given answer is correct or not.
        Parameters:
        answer - The given answer.
        Returns:
        True if the answer is correct, else false.
